Hackernews Feed

Chrome and Firefox extension to have a quick peek at the current Hacker News front page

View on GitHub Download .zip Download .tar.gz

Follow @nishanthvijayan

Thank you human!

Thank you for Installing/Updating Hackernews-feed.

If you found this extension useful, give our repo a star maybe? :)

What's New?

  • v0.6.2 (firefox) - Hackernews-feed is now multiprocess compatible.
    Thank you @gerdneuman for your contribution.

  • v0.6.1 (firefox) - Ask for feedback on uninstall/disable
  • v0.6.0 (firefox) - Migrated from cfx to jpm

Complaints / Feedback ?

Would you like to see any new features? Noticed any bugs? Please let me know by adding an issue or by filling up this form.
